# Setup
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(daymetr)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv("../data/daymet/index.csv")


```

```{r}
df_test <- df %>%
  filter(loc == "Altus, OK")

df_test %>%
  distinct(year) %>%
  nrow

30*365

df_test_w <- df %>%
  mutate(weather = pmap(list(.y = year,
                        .site = loc,
                        .lat = lat,
                        .lon = lon),
                        function(.y, .site, .lat, .lon)
                          download_daymet(
  site = .site,
  lat = .lat,
  lon = .lon,
  start = .y,
  end = .y,
  internal = TRUE,
  simplify = TRUE # return tidy data !!
  ) %>%
    rename(yr = year)
                          
                        
                        ))



df_test_w %>%
  unnest(weather) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = measurement,
              values_from = value)
```
